name: Student Grade DB
tagline: Stab at PHP a year back with a Student Grade DB
body:
### Welcome to Student Grade Database

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout master
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Steps to run:
You need phpMyAdmin to begin with and an Apache server. I used XAMPP and it was all that I needed.
Deploy the project in Apache and run the index page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
